title: eXp Revenue Share 2.0: Increased Earnings for Agents
excerpt: Key Points: 7-Tier Revenue Share: Earn income from agents you recruit (Tier 1) down to 7 tiers. Income: Funded by eXp’s 20% commission split, not…
content:
Key Points:

  • 7-Tier Revenue Share: Earn income from agents you recruit (Tier 1) down to 7 tiers.
  • Income: Funded by eXp’s 20% commission split, not agent commissions.
  • 2024 Enhancements: Faster earnings, reduced FLQA requirements for Tiers 2-3, and Fast Start Attraction Bonuses (up to $4k per recruit).
  • Passive Wealth: Earn residual income indefinitely—even after retirement—and can will it to heirs.
  • No Recruitment Pressure: The focus remains on real estate sales. Top agents earn 6-8 figures annually from revenue share alone.
  • Support: Smart Agent Alliance offers free tools/coaching to build your network.
  • RevShare calculator: See the potential (shows the minimum payout; you can expect up to 50% higher payouts)

Welcome to eXp Revenue Share 2.0, where agents get paid just for sharing what they already love—eXp Realty.

Not sure how revenue share works, or worried eXp Realty is an MLM? It is—but not a shady one. MLM just means you earn money when agents you bring in succeed. And with eXp’s revenue share model, that success can pay you over and over again.

In 2024, eXp Realty agents earned over $200 million in rev share income, and with Revenue Share 2.0, it’s now even easier to earn faster and build real, lasting income.

The best part? With the right eXp sponsor team (that’s us), you don’t have to chase agents or host awkward coffee meetings. We do the heavy lifting—while you’re showing homes, at the beach, or watching Netflix—and still put dollars in your pocket.

Let’s break it all down: what revenue share is, how to grow it, and why our eXp revenue share calculator shows just how powerful this program can be. Here’s your hand-dandy index:

How eXp Realty Revenue Share Income Works

Huge Side Benefits to eXp Realty Revenue Share Program

Generating Multiple Streams of Income
Brilliance of eXp Realty Revenue Share Program – Everyone Wins

Who Can Earn Revenue Share Income?

How is eXp Realty’s Revenue Share Income Paid For?

eXp Realty Revenue Share Minimum Payouts & Percentages

Revenue Share 2.0 Enhancements
Explore More About eXp Revenue Share
Here’s the bottom line:
Frequently Asked Questions

How eXp Realty Revenue Share Income Works

By attracting other talented agents to join eXp Realty, you contribute to the company’s growth and earn a slice of the revenue earned by the agents you attract. While most agents naturally share their positive experiences about their brokerage, the difference at eXp Realty is that you get paid for it.

The best part? Your revenue share income comes from eXp’s company dollar—not from the new agents you bring in. This means new agents don’t have to give up part of their commissions, and your support is completely free to them. It’s a win-win for everyone involved.

How an eXp Agent Becomes an eXp Realty Sponsor

Becoming a sponsor at eXp Realty is simple. If you’ve joined eXp and another agent expresses interest in joining, all you need to do is direct them to the eXp Realty join application link and ask them to name you as their sponsor in the application. That’s it! eXp Realty automates everything from there.

What is an eXp Realty Frontline Agent?

Agents that join eXp and name you as their sponsor are known as your frontline agents or Tier 1 agents. These agents are also referred to as Front Line Qualifying Agents (FLQAs) when they are actively producing income by closing deals. You’ll earn a small percentage of their earned commissions each year until they hit their cap.

Your eXp Realty Network of Agents Expands

Your revenue share income doesn’t stop with your frontline agents. When your Tier 1 agents sponsor new agents to join eXp, those new agents become your Tier 2 agents, and you’ll earn a small percentage of their commissions as well. This pattern continues down seven tiers, creating a powerful network of agents in your downline.

As each tier of agents sponsors new producing agents, your earning potential grows exponentially. To maximize your revenue share income, you’ll need to unlock each tier by meeting specific FLQA requirements. I’ll explain that in more detail below.

Exponential Growth with Revenue Share

Revenue share income isn’t just a nice bonus—it can be life-changing. Some eXp agents are earning 6, 7, and even 8 figures annually from revenue share alone, on top of their production commissions. How does this happen? It’s all about the seven-tier structure and the cascading effect of growth.

Here’s how it works:

When you sponsor an agent directly, they become your Tier 1 agent, and you earn a percentage of their commissions. If your Tier 1 agent sponsors another agent, that new agent becomes your Tier 2 agent, and you’ll earn from their commissions too. This pattern continues down to Tier 7, creating a network of agents who contribute to your revenue share income.

Let’s break it down with numbers to show just how powerful this system can be:
Imagine you sponsor just 2 producing agents, and each of them sponsors 2 more agents, who then sponsor 2 more agents, and so on. By the time you reach Tier 7, those initial 2 agents have grown into a network of 128 agents, all contributing to your revenue share income. That’s not just income—that’s magical exponential growth!

See It in Action: Want to explore how this could work for you? Try our eXp Revenue Share Calculator to input different numbers of agents on each tier and see the minimum payout you could earn, assuming all downline agents are capping agents. It’s a powerful way to visualize the potential of eXp’s revenue share program and how it can transform your business.

Huge Side Benefits to eXp Realty Revenue Share Program

Besides the obvious benefit of earning more money, the revenue share program has other huge side benefits!

eXp Agents Can Retire and Still Get their Revenue Share Income

A key benefit of eXp revenue share income is that it can provide agent sponsors with a reliable exit plan. That is, real estate agents usually stop earning an income when they stop doing real estate transactions, but at eXp Realty, agent sponsors can retire and still get their revenue share residual income indefinitely! Wow, financial freedom!

eXp Agents Can Die and Still Provide for Loved Ones

Furthermore, an agent’s eXp revenue share income is willable. That’s right! When an agent sponsor dies, their loved ones can continue receiving the revenue share income stream. Furthermore, because of the 7-tier structure, that income may even grow larger over time. It’s a powerful way to provide ongoing financial support for family members.

Generating Multiple Streams of Income

Participating in revenue share opens up avenues for agents to generate multiple streams of income within eXp’s business model. eXp agents can also earn from commissions as real estate agents and as referral agents, and they can earn from their eXp stock purchases and awards. More about eXp income streams here.

Brilliance of eXp Realty Revenue Share Program – Everyone Wins

Let’s face it—eXp Realty’s revenue share program isn’t just good; it’s downright brilliant. Why? Because it’s designed so that everyone wins: agents, sponsors, and eXp Realty itself. It’s a model that creates incentives and support you won’t find at traditional brokerages. Here’s how it works its magic:

Agents Win: Support, Success, and Exponential Growth

Agents at eXp Realty get the best of both worlds. Not only do they earn commissions from their own real estate transactions, but they also benefit from the 7-tier sponsorship structure. Here’s the kicker: agents receive support from their “upline”—the seven sponsors above them—while also building their own downline of agents they’ve sponsored. It’s like having a built-in support system and a growing income stream, all in one.

But here’s the real gem: sponsors only earn revenue share when their downline agents are actively earning commissions. This means sponsors are incentivized to help their agents succeed. Whether it’s sharing tips, providing training, or offering mentorship, sponsors have a vested interest in seeing their downline thrive.

Pro Tip: Not all sponsors are created equal. While eXp doesn’t require sponsors to provide support, some (like Smart Agent Alliance) go above and beyond to help their agents succeed. Choosing the right sponsor can make all the difference in your revenue share journey.

Sponsors Win: Income, Impact, and Fulfillment

For sponsors, the revenue share program is a win-win. Not only do they earn extra income from their downline agents’ commissions, but they also get the satisfaction of helping others succeed. It’s not just about making money—it’s about making a difference.

Imagine this: you help an agent join eXp, and they go on to build a thriving real estate career. Then, they sponsor others, who sponsor others, and so on. Before you know it, you’ve created a ripple effect of success, and you’re earning revenue share income every step of the way. It’s like planting seeds and watching a forest grow.

eXp Wins: Happy Agents, Rapid Growth, and a Thriving Community

Of course, eXp Realty wins too. By fostering a culture of collaboration and mutual support, eXp creates an environment where agents are happy, motivated, and eager to share the opportunity with others. This has helped eXp become the fastest-growing brokerage on the planet.

But it’s not just about growth—it’s about creating a community where agents feel supported, valued, and empowered to achieve their goals. When agents win, eXp wins. And when eXp wins, agents win even more. It’s a beautiful cycle of success.

Who Can Earn Revenue Share Income?

Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting out in the real estate industry, you have the potential to boost your income through the powerful revenue share program offered by eXp.

New Agents to eXp Realty Can Start Immediately

One common misconception among new agents is that they need to spend months or years at eXp before they begin attracting other agents to join. However, this is not true! In fact, some sponsorship groups have devised a clever structure where experienced agents from the new agent’s upline take on much of the heavy lifting. That’s the power of Smart Agent Alliance.

Selling Houses Isn’t a Requirement

Selling houses is not necessary to earn revenue share income. Being an active real estate agent certainly has its perks, but it is not mandatory for earning a revenue share income. Agents can choose to both sell houses and sponsor agents to the company or they can choose to do one or the other.

How is eXp Realty’s Revenue Share Income Paid For?

Let’s get into the nitty-gritty of how eXp Realty’s revenue share income works—because understanding where the money comes from is key to seeing just how awesome this program is!

The Magic of eXp’s Company Dollar

Here’s the deal: your revenue share income doesn’t come out of the pockets of the agents you sponsor. Instead, it comes from eXp’s company dollar. Here’s how it breaks down:

  • Until agents hit their $16,000 cap, they earn an 80/20 commission split. That means agents keep 80% of their commissions, and eXp keeps 20%.
  • Out of that 20%, eXp is committed to paying sponsors 50% of that as revenue share income. So, when you sponsor agents, you’re earning a slice of that 10%—not from the agents themselves, but from eXp’s share.
  • Once an agent hits their cap, they keep 100% of their commissions for the rest of the year, and eXp stops collecting the 20% split. That means revenue share income is earned only while agents are working toward their cap.

How Sponsors Get Paid

Revenue share income is distributed to sponsors based on the performance of their downline agents. The more productive your downline is, the more you earn. It’s that simple. And because eXp automates the entire process, you don’t have to worry about tracking commissions or managing payments—it’s all taken care of for you.

eXp Realty Revenue Share Minimum Payouts & Percentages

This chart shows the minimum payout sponsors earn per capping agent in their downline each year. Sponsors are paid a percentage of each agent’s commissions as those commissions are being earned. Additionally, agents earn more from a bonus pool on their levels 1 – 3. In the past, that payout has been 20 – 50% higher than these minimums.

Why eXp’s Approach is Different

Here’s where eXp Realty really stands out: while most other brokerages with revenue share models advertise “maximum” payout potential, eXp does the opposite. Instead of overpromising, eXp provides minimum payout numbers, ensuring that agents have a realistic understanding of what they can earn.

In other words:

  • Other brokerages might quote inflated numbers to make their programs seem more attractive, but those numbers often don’t reflect reality.
  • eXp, on the other hand, underpromises and over-delivers. The minimum payouts are just the starting point, and the bonus pool often pushes earnings much higher.

This approach reflects eXp’s commitment to transparency and fairness. It’s not about flashy marketing—it’s about delivering real value to agents.

Profit Share vs Revenue Share

One common question is: What’s the difference between profit share and revenue share?

  • Profit Share:
    In profit share programs, earnings are distributed based on the profits of a company after expenses. This means that payouts can be less predictable and often lower, as they depend on the company’s profitability after costs. For example, Keller Williams has a profit-sharing program.  More about that below.
  • Revenue Share:
    eXp Realty’s revenue share program distributes earnings based on the revenue generated by agents, not profits. This ensures more consistent and higher payouts for agents, as it’s not dependent on the company’s expenses. Revenue share is a more transparent and lucrative model for agents, allowing them to earn more from their efforts.

Revenue Share 2.0 Enhancements

In 2024, eXp introduced several enhancements to make revenue share even more lucrative and accessible:

  1. Removal of FLQA Requirements for Tiers 2 and 3

Previously, agents needed a certain number of FLQAs to unlock Tiers 2 and 3. Now, more agents can earn from these tiers without meeting those thresholds.

  1. Fast Start Attraction Bonus

When you sponsor a new agent, you can earn 50% of the revenue share pool from their first year, up to $4,000 for fully capped agents or 5% of their Gross Commission Income (GCI) during their capping period.

  1. “Pay Now” Feature

With the “Pay Now” feature, you can instantly access your revenue share income as soon as a transaction closes—no more waiting for the monthly check. The cost? Just a $1 introductory fee. This feature has been a game-changer for agents who want more control over their finances. Whether you’re covering closing costs, investing in your business, or simply enjoying the fruits of your labor, the “Pay Now” feature ensures your money is available when you need it.

Explore More About eXp Revenue Share

If you’re curious about how eXp’s revenue share program compares to other brokerages like Keller Williams, Exit Realty, and Real Brokerage, or if you want to understand why eXp’s model is not a pyramid scheme, we’ve got you covered. For a deeper dive into these topics, check out our detailed guides:

  • eXp Revenue Share vs. Other Models – Learn how eXp’s 7-tier structure and transparent payouts set it apart from the competition.
  • Why eXp Revenue Share is NOT a Pyramid Scheme – Discover the key differences between legitimate revenue share programs and illegal pyramid schemes.
  • How Revenue Share Works for Brokers and Team Leaders – Find out how bringing your entire team to eXp can boost your income while reducing your workload.

These resources will help you understand why eXp Realty’s revenue share program is the best in the industry.

Here’s the bottom line:

The eXp Realty revenue share program isn’t just another income stream—it’s a real shot at building long-term wealth, financial freedom, and a team you don’t have to babysit. And with Revenue Share 2.0, eXp made it even easier to grow faster, earn more, and finally feel like your brokerage is actually working for you.

But here’s where things get next-level: when you partner with Smart Agent Alliance as your sponsor, you’re not doing it alone. We spend our time and money to give you tools that actually move the needle. Like your own custom agent attraction website (yep, we build it and host it for free), so you can start attracting agents while you’re out selling homes—or, let’s be honest, rewatching Selling Sunset.

We also host the video calls to convince your leads to join you as their sponsor.  Plus, we offer ongoing agent attraction training to sharpen your skills and build a real, duplicating team. This isn’t just another “rev share model”—it’s a smarter one, backed by a team that wants to see you win.

To learn more about eXp Realty and Smart Agent Alliance, visit SmartAgentAlliance.com, explore our free tools, or book a meeting. Let’s build something that pays you now and later.

Frequently Asked Questions

How does eXp Realty revenue share work?

eXp Realty pays agents a percentage of company revenue when agents they sponsor close deals. Earnings grow through seven tiers as your downline expands. eXp Realty’s Revenue Share 2.0 is a game-changer.

Is eXp Realty an MLM?

Yes, eXp Realty uses a multi-level compensation model (MLM), but it’s not a pyramid scheme. Agents are paid based on real production, not recruitment alone.

What is a Front Line Qualifying Agent (FLQA)?

An FLQA is an agent you sponsor who closes at least two deals or earns $5,000 in gross commission income (GCI) in six months. FLQAs help unlock tiers 4 – 7 of income.

How much can I earn with eXp revenue share?

You can earn thousands—or even six to seven figures—depending on your downline’s size and production. Try our eXp revenue share calculator to estimate your income potential.

Do I have to sell homes to earn revenue share at eXp?

No, you don’t have to sell homes to earn revenue share. You can focus solely on sponsoring agents, or do both—sell and recruit.

When is eXp Realty revenue share paid out?

eXp pays revenue share monthly, typically on the 20th. Agents can also use the Pay Now feature to cash out immediately after each transaction for a small fee.

What’s the difference between revenue share and profit share?

Revenue share pays from the company’s gross income before expenses. Profit share pays only after company costs are covered, making revenue share more consistent and transparent.

How do I become an eXp Realty sponsor?

Just have an agent list you as their sponsor when they join eXp Realty. Once that’s done, the company tracks and pays out revenue share automatically.

Can I earn revenue share from international agents?

Yes, eXp Realty’s revenue share program works globally. You can earn income from agents in all countries where eXp operates.

Is revenue share income willable if I pass away?

Yes, your eXp Realty revenue share is willable. If you pass away, your named beneficiary can continue receiving your rev share income.

Can I keep earning revenue share after I retire?

Yes, once you build your downline, you can keep earning revenue share even after you stop selling. As long as your downline is producing, you keep earning.

Are there any fees to participate in eXp revenue share?

Nope! There are no extra costs to participate. All eXp agents are automatically eligible to earn revenue share.

Does eXp Realty provide a revenue share chart?

Yes, eXp provides a revenue share chart that shows minimum payouts per capping agent on each tier. These are base numbers—actual payouts are even higher.

Does Smart Agent Alliance help agents earn revenue share?

Yes! Smart Agent Alliance builds your agent attraction website, hosts attraction calls, and gives you live training to help you grow your downline with less effort. Not sure what agents think about eXp and other brokerages, see anonymous agent reviews.

What is shared revenue in real estate?

Shared revenue means earnings are split between contributors. At eXp, it refers to the revenue split between the company and the agents who help grow it.

What is a revenue share agreement?

A revenue share agreement outlines how company revenue is shared with participants. At eXp Realty, the agreement is built into the agent’s independent contractor arrangement.

Can I build a real estate team using revenue share?

Yes. Many agents grow their own eXp Realty teams using the revenue share model. You build a network and earn from production across seven tiers.

Is there a cap on how many agents I can sponsor?

No, there’s no cap. You can sponsor as many agents as you want, and each one increases your revenue share potential.

eXp Realty Healthcare vs Other Brokerages
Success Stories

Health Insurance That Works For Agents, Not Against Them
Frequently Asked Questions

Does eXp Realty have healthcare?

Clearwater Benefits

eXp partnered with Clearwater Benefits over 5 years ago to provide U.S.-based eXp agents and their families with better healthcare at lower costs.

As an eXp agent, eXp Realty Healthcare by Clearwater succeeds by helping you:

eXp Realty Healthcare by Clearwater provides a unique balance between affordability and high-quality coverage. Many plans include low copays, low out-of-pocket costs, and zero-dollar deductibles.

Agents get the healthcare they need at prices substantially below traditional open-market health plans.

Wide Range of Healthcare Options

eXp Realty Healthcare offers a wide range of healthcare options. The best part? You don’t have to figure it out yourself. That’s because eXp Realty Healthcare provides a personalized approach.

eXp Realty Healthcare meticulously assesses each agent’s situation to determine the most cost-effective plans without compromising on quality. The experts will guide you to your best healthcare solution. Let’s review the three primary ways an eXp agent may go:

eXp Realty Healthcare Solution

Crafted by Clearwater, this is the gold standard for maximizing your benefits while minimizing your costs. Think top-notch network access and minimized risk—all served up with a side of serious savings. We’ll unpack the juicy details shortly.

Traditional Health Insurance

Prefer the tried and true? This option provides traditional marketplace plans. The best part? There are no extra fees to get these through eXp Realty Healthcare. Our team will navigate the maze of plans to find the one that fits you like a glove.

Supplemental Insurance

And because we love options, there’s also supplemental insurance. Dental, vision, accident, critical illness, and disability insurance. Tailor your coverage to fit your life and sleep easy, knowing you’re fully covered.

Unlock the Perks: Why eXp Realty Healthcare Rocks

Agents Save More Dollars Every Year

Top of the perks list? The cash savings are massive. On average, eXp agents bank more than $8,000 each year from switching to eXp Realty Healthcare – that’s a whopping 60% or more reduction in fixed medical expenses. But the savings don’t stop there. Clearwater reports an eye-popping 80% drop in out-of-pocket costs for eXp agents compared to traditional health insurance plans. Imagine keeping more of your hard-earned cash while still enjoying top-notch medical care.

Same Quality Care with Nationwide Open Networks

Switch to eXp Realty Healthcare, and you won’t sacrifice quality for cost. Thanks to access to two of the nation’s largest PPO networks, finding the perfect doctor or specialist is a breeze. Love your current doctor? No worries, you’re likely to keep them thanks to the extensive network options.

No Limits, Maximum Payouts, or Hassles

Say goodbye to the usual limits on doctor visits, labs, and prescriptions. With eXp, the coverage keeps on giving, without caps to hold you back. If you hate dealing with logistics, you’ll love the Care Coordination team. They help you find providers and schedule the care you need for labs, imaging, and hospital services. Plus, when you use this service, your copays and out-of-pocket costs are waived. You heard that right! Your care will be free!

Expert Second Opinion services

That’s right! At eXp Realty Healthcare, you’ll get the added perk of having access to life-saving consultations from leading specialists in their field for that all-important second opinion.

No Enrollment Deadlines

Forget about enrollment deadlines. eXp Realty Healthcare lets you jump on board any time of the year. eXp agents are not inconvenienced by those traditional medical enrollment deadlines.

Mental Healthcare

And there’s more. eXp Realty, through Clearwater, also provides Telemedicine to bring agents high-quality virtual mental health services. eXp Realty is always looking out for the best for their agents.

eXp Realty Healthcare vs Other Brokerages

This chart says it all. When comparing eXp Realty with other big brokerages such as Coldwell Banker, Remas, KW, Berkshire Hathoway, Compass, and even Real, eXp shines. Of all these brokerages, only eXp offers exclusive health plans for their agents. Additionally, only eXp Realty has innovative healthcare plans that save agents thousands of dollars every year.

Success Stories

Ready for some personal actual agent stories? When eXp Realty Healthcare became an option, many eXp agents decided to give it a go. Here are some of their stories.

Cancer Diagnosis – $8000 Saved Annually

At 26, Florida realtor Beth Silverman fought breast cancer alongside struggles to secure and afford health insurance as an independent contractor. Beth said, “Being a real estate agent meant endless battles for insurance that normal people who have not been touched by cancer can never understand.”

Now in remission, Beth faced recurring challenges such as annual re-enrollment, soaring premiums, and restricted networks. By switching to eXp Realty Healthcare, Beth saves roughly $8,000 annually on premiums. She says, “I have a cost-sharing plan through eXp, and it’s different than what people are used to. It’s community-based, and trust me … I’m saving thousands in the yearly premium, and prescription costs are a bit cheaper.”

Same Doctors, Same Care Quality – $10,000 Saved Annually

Joe Sinnona from Long Beach, New York, an eXp agent, discovered substantial savings with eXp Realty Healthcare Clearwater compared to his previous health plan. In 2018, Joe was paying $1,500 a month for his family’s health insurance, and the cost was set to increase to $1,850.

Facing these rising costs, Joe and his wife considered dropping their coverage but ultimately found a more affordable solution through eXp. Now, they pay just $791 monthly for the family’s healthcare and have even added dental coverage for an additional $100 a month.

Joe shares, “Same doctors, same quality of care. I raised the deductible and was able to get this affordable healthcare plan through eXp Realty.” He aims to serve as a testament to other agents seeking reliable and cost-effective health insurance.

Same Doctors – $12,000 Saved Annually

Drew Schroeder from Indianapolis, an eXp Realty ICON Agent, found himself reevaluating his health insurance as costs soared to $1,588 per month. After consulting his financial advisors and discussing the eXp Realty Healthcare Clearwater plan via a thorough Zoom meeting, Drew was convinced by the plan’s value.

In Drew’s words, “This is a special program your company is offering you. You need to do it.” By switching, Drew saves over $12,000 annually while maintaining the same doctors for his family. He appreciates how eXp helps bridge common gaps for agents, allowing him to focus on family and his career without the stress of healthcare costs.

Innovative Solutions for the Best Solution

When Gogo Bethke’s husband left his corporate job, the family lost their employer-provided health insurance. Gogo was shocked at the high cost of open-market healthcare. Previously paying around $900 monthly, including coverage for their son who has Type 1 diabetes, they needed an affordable alternative.

Clearwater offered a personalized solution, splitting their son’s coverage into an open market plan and the rest of the family’s into a Clearwater plan. Now, Gogo pays about $400 for her son’s plan and $865 for the family, which is significantly less than potential open-market costs.

Gogo said “It’s still much cheaper than the open market where we would be paying three times the cost”. Plus, Gogo says that the Clearwater plan her family chose offers very inexpensive prescriptions, diagnostic services, and doctor visits.

What Plans Do eXp Agents Typically Choose?

Are you wondering what health plans eXp agents often select after discussing their unique situations with eXp Realty Healthcare experts?

85% of eXp agents find that Clearwater is a great fit. This includes people who are generally healthy and under 65 years old.

10% of eXp agents get traditional health insurance through advice from Clearwater at no additional cost than the open market provides. This is a good fit for people with pre-existing conditions.

5% of eXp agents are advised by Clearwater to stay on their current plan. But, even if you don’t make a switch, it’s great to have the Clearwater professionals let you know that you are already on the right plan.

So, the vast majority of eXp agents end up with a Clearwater plan. But, all of them get expert advice to determine what is best for them.

Is it easy to sign up for eXp Realty Healthcare?

Absolutely! Choosing the right plan is simple with the guidance of the eXp Realty Healthcare team, and it takes less than five minutes to enroll. Getting healthcare is fast and simple for eXp agents.

Health Insurance That Works For Agents, Not Against Them

Look, real estate is already a rollercoaster—you don’t need your healthcare to be another surprise drop. With eXp Healthcare, agents finally get access to real, affordable, high-quality coverage that doesn’t feel like a second full-time job to figure out. And the numbers speak for themselves: thousands saved per year, better networks, no annoying enrollment deadlines, and expert support that doesn’t ghost you when you need answers.

But here’s the kicker—this level of agent-first innovation isn’t just about health plans. It’s baked into everything eXp Realty does. From commission splits to tech tools to stock awards, eXp is obsessed with helping agents keep more, do more, and stress way less.

And if you really want to level up? Plug into Smart Agent Alliance, the team that makes all this even better. As part of our squad, you’ll get:

  • A done-for-you and hosted real estate attraction website
  • Social Agent Academy Pro ($10,500 value) for social media marketing
  • Weekly coaching sessions with top producers
  • Customizable lead funnels, email campaigns, and marketing templates
  • PLUS Smart Agent Alliance runs meetings so you gain passive income

All free for agents who join eXp Realty and name a Smart Agent Alliance founder as their sponsor. Learn more about how eXp Realty and Smart Agent Alliance can help you scale your career. Not sure if eXp is the right fit for you? Not sure how passive income grows?  You can play with the numbers using our exp realty revenue share calculator to see how much you could earn. Not sure how to become a real estate agent? We’ve got loads of helpful info on that too. Partner with us today and take your real estate career to the next level!

Frequently Asked Questions

Does eXp Realty have healthcare?

Yes, eXp partnered with Clearwater Benefits over 5 years ago to provide U.S.-based eXp agents and their families with better healthcare at lower costs. eXp Realty Healthcare by Clearwater aims to help agents save on average $8000 on fixed medical costs and 80% on out-of-pocket costs while upgrading your network of doctors and hospitals.

Does eXp Realty offer only 1 choice for Healthcare?

No, eXp Realty Healthcare includes options by Clearwater offering an innovative solution to save money without compromising care, traditional plans available on the market but not costing more to get through eXp Realty Healthcare, and many supplemental choices including dental, vision, accident, critical illness, and disability insurance.

What are the benefits of eXp Realty Healthcare by Clearwater?

Agents save on average $8000 and 80% savings on out-of-pocket costs annually compared to traditional plans. Other Benefits: Access to two of the largest PPO networks; no Limits or maximum payouts; coordination services to help find providers and schedule the care for labs, imaging, and hospital services; expert second opinion services, no enrollment deadlines and mental healthcare services.

How is eXp Realty Healthcare different from other brokerages?

First, eXp Realty actually has a healthcare option. Second, of the major brokerages, only eXp offers exclusive health plans for their agents. Additionally, only Realty eXp has innovative healthcare plans that save agents thousands of dollars every year.

title: Inside eXp World: Why This Virtual Office Crushes Traditional Brokerages
excerpt: Key Points 24/7 Support: Instant access to brokers, tech help, and Luna (AI assistant) for quick answers anytime. Virtual 3D Hub: A browser-based workspace for…
content:
Key Points

  • 24/7 Support: Instant access to brokers, tech help, and Luna (AI assistant) for quick answers anytime.
  • Virtual 3D Hub: A browser-based workspace for meetings, training, and client interactions—no physical office needed.
  • Global Network: Collaborate with 85,000+ agents worldwide, with real-time translation for seamless communication.
  • Custom Avatars/Offices: Personalize your virtual presence and design branded meeting spaces.
  • Live Training & Tools: 50+ weekly sessions, on-demand courses, and free tools (CRM, marketing).
  • Mobile Access: Full functionality on smartphones/tablets—work from anywhere.

Are you still stuck in the past? Don’t be a real estate dinosaur! Jump into the future with eXp Realty, the disruptor redefining our industry. Packed with cutting-edge tools, eXp is all about boosting your productivity, efficiency, and satisfaction.

And guess what? eXp Realty is always evolving, adding new features to keep you at the top of your game. Take eXp World, for instance – our revolutionary digital office space is now new and improved and accessible right from your web browser! And, yes, eXp Realty is the ONLY brokerage with a digital office metaverse.

Over 87,000 agents globally are tapping into a vivid 3D world from their devices. eXp World is your one-stop hub for everything from support and training to client meetings and strategy sessions with peers.

It’s also the perfect place to relax with a virtual coffee and chat about the big deals. You do all this while networking and expanding your business beyond borders.

Welcome to the future of real estate, where eXp World makes every interaction more efficient and connected. Curious to see how eXp World can transform your real estate game? This blog will be your roadmap for getting around eXp World. Ready to explore? Here’s your handy dandy index:

What’s eXp World?

Quick Start Guide to eXp World
Customize Your Avatar: Show Off Your Style in eXp World
Explore the Terrain: Live Tours
Customize Your Virtual Office for Clients
Ask a Broker, Get an Answer
Agent Support – Get Answers, Grab Opportunities

Explore the Infosphere

Agent Solutions

What is kvCORE?
eXp World Entertainment Options
Community Vibes in eXp World
Mobile Accessibility
Future Innovations
The Future of Real Estate Is Virtual (And Functional)
Frequently Asked Questions

How do I get a free pass to Explore eXp World?
What is eXp World?
How do l learn about eXp World?

What’s eXp World?

Are you feeling somewhat lost because you don’t really understand what eXp World is? Well, you’re in for a treat! eXp World is a revolutionary digital cloud-based world crafted specifically for eXp real estate agents from around the globe.

And, when we say around the globe, we mean it. Supporting eXp’s presence in 27 global locations, the platform features real-time translation through closed captions. This feature ensures effortless communication across borders, allowing everyone to participate and understand discussions fully.

eXp World is engineered for collaboration, learning, and working together and with clients – all from the comfort of your couch. Yes, siree! eXp World leverages virtual reality to transform the real estate business, making your workday faster and smoother.

eXp’s cutting-edge technology supports seamless real-time collaboration, allowing you to share screens, hold meetings, and chat as naturally as if you were in the same room. Communication flows easily with instant messaging, voice chats, and video calls that feel just like face-to-face interactions.

eXp World Benefits

Imagine logging into a cloud-based customized office where you can meet your clients. Imagine getting all your problems solved easily and quickly. Imagine holding team meetings, joining training sessions, or brainstorming with colleagues. And, yes, you are talking to real people in eXp World, not bots!

Imagine easily getting all your issues solved like questions for brokers, transactions and tech issues, questions about eXp Realty programs and partners and so much more!

It’s all there in one location. No need to commute. No need to wait hours to get something resolved. It’s a game-changer for saving both time and money.

Side point. While you can do tons in eXp World – and eXp World is this blog’s topic – if it’s not your thing, no worries. Using eXp World is not mandatory. eXp offers several other connection methods too. For example, you can email your broker or call eXpert Care them 24/7.

eXp Realty is about providing agent choices. That’s just one of the reasons eXp Realty is the largest independent real estate brokerage and the most agent-centric brokerage on the planet. Ok, let’s walk through eXp World together!

Quick Start Guide to eXp World

Navigating eXp World for the first time can feel like stepping into a new universe. Your journey begins with the website address, and clicking “connect. It’s super fast. Once inside eXp World, you’ll be in the “Welcome Area”. A vibrant, virtual landscape will greet you there.

But make no mistake! The first time you enter eXp World, you’ll be in the “Welcome Area”, but once in you can bookmark any place to return directly there when you return. Ahhhh, the power of a web-based experience.

Back to your initial experience when you enter eXp World, it’s easy to check out the space, just click on the screen and move your mouse.

Getting around is also a breeze. Move forward and backward with your up and down keyboard arrow keys. Change directions with your left and right keyboard arrows. And, if you’d like to move faster, press your keyboard’s shift key to speed up.

Want to chat with someone? Just click the microphone icon to start talking.

Got a question? Ask with the Help button in the lower right, or chat with anyone through the chat button, or ask at the Welcome Desk. Get inside the blue box on the ground so the Welcome Desk staff can hear you. Or, ask Luna.

Customize Your Avatar: Show Off Your Style in eXp World

When you first enter eXp World, you’ll be a robot. But don’t stay basic for long! Personalizing your avatar is fun and also reflects your unique identity or brand. Start your avatar customization by clicking the three bars at the top right. Choose “Profile”, then “Customize Avatar”.

Choose Avatar Type “Human” and then choose all the facets of your look from a variety of hairstyles, outfits, and accessories. Or choose “Android” and stay a robot but pick your color. Or choose “Ready Player Me” to use your picture to create the most life-like reflection of yourself.

Whether channeling your real-life style or creating a brand new persona, personalizing your avatar is all about self-expression. Plus, you can easily switch up your look for different meetings or just to keep things interesting.

Updating your avatar for special events or whenever inspiration hits is quick and enjoyable, ensuring you always make the perfect impression in every virtual interaction.

Explore the Terrain: Live Tours

Now that you’ve chosen your personal look, it’s time to get the lay of the land in eXp World. Head over to the Welcome Area desk and catch one of the live tours offered.

Currently, you can jump into one of those three times each weekday. To discover the times the tours are offered, click on the “eXp Events and Training Calendar”. It’s hard to miss!

Customize Your Virtual Office for Clients

In eXp World, customization extends beyond just avatars. You can style your own virtual office to meet with clients or colleagues! Get started by clicking the three bars at the top right and choosing “Frames”, then “Create Frame”.

Next, name your space and choose an environment from the myriad of choices. Then decorate your walls with images, PDFs, videos, whiteboards, polls, and streaming screens where you can share your webcam or your screen.

When it comes time for meetings, whether they’re one-on-one chats or large group brainstorming sessions, your Frame is a powerhouse. Screen sharing and virtual whiteboards make every meet-up more engaging, allowing you to share documents or hash out ideas on the fly.

You can also explore neighborhoods with clients using 360 photos and Google Street View right within the platform.

eXp World is built to handle any meeting type with ease. Its versatile setup ensures that you can tailor the experience for optimal productivity, no matter the size of your gathering.

Of course, remember that agents can also meet in person at one of the 3000 Regus office business center locations around the globe. So if the virtual office really doesn’t float your boat, eXp has your back. eXp agents can meet in person too, at one of these business lounges – for free, it’s included in your monthly $85 fee.

Ask a Broker, Get an Answer

Need some quick advice or a deep dive on a tricky issue? eXp World is your go-to spot. Here, our brokers are ready to focus entirely on you. Furthermore, brokers are part of the eXp Realty staff. They are not paid from your commissions like at traditional brokerages. Every eXp agent gets the full, undivided attention of our brokers.

To get to your broker, just click “Go To,” then “US Broker Rooms,” select your state, and check-in. A friendly receptionist will guide you straight to the right expert. And guess what? You hardly ever have to wait! It sure beats tracking down the only broker available in a traditional brokerage office.

Pro tip: Bookmark your state’s broker room web URL for direct lightning-fast access to the broker’s office. Super handy!

Agent Support – Get Answers, Grab Opportunities

eXp World is your one-stop shop for all your queries and for discovering new opportunities. Let’s hit “Go To”, then “Agent Support” and explore!

Explore the Infosphere

Beam into the Infosphere at eXp World, where you’ll find a wealth of resources tailored for every aspect of your real estate career. Here you’ll find eXp Luxury, eXp Commercial, and eXp’s Referral Division. There’s also Onboarding, Mentor Program, ICON status, eXp University, eXp Revenos, State-specific resources, and even a video on how to fill out your join eXp Realty application.

Most of what is in Infosphere should be pretty self-explanatory. However, if you’re not on top of all that eXp Realty has to offer, you might not know about our awesome eXp Referrals and eXp Revenos divisions.

What is eXp Revenos?

Revenos is eXp’s engine to bring agents top-quality referrals. The division provides training and certification so you can be the agent awarded business that Revenos does all the work to get. For example, through Revenos you gain corporate transferee clients, bank-owned property clients, ibuyer clients, and more. Moreover, Revenos keeps identifying new referral opportunities for agents.

What is eXp Referrals?

Speaking of referrals, once you have one or give one to another agent, eXp has a referral tool to safeguard and document your referral agreement. In fact, eXp’s Referral tool makes sending and managing referrals straightforward. The tool automatically populates agent details, identifies necessary eSignatures, and ensures all paperwork is handled efficiently from start to finish. All you do is fill that form out and upload it into Skyslope. It’s super easy and quick.

Expert Care

Let’s get back to other eXp World areas for agent support. Take “Expert Care”, for example. Here’s your place to ask all your onboarding or general eXp Realty questions. Expert Care is open 24/7. So you’ll never need to wait to get your questions answered.

Transactions/Expert Care

Here’s another eXp Realty area that is open 24/7. Here you get all your transaction issues resolved. Staff members are ready to help agents with any issue, big or small.

Explore Accounting

And, then there’s “Accounting”. This is where you’ll head for questions or issues with payables, commissions, 1099’s, billing, revenue share, and stock questions. Hey, and if you don’t know what revenue share is, be sure to check out our blog or youtube on the topic. It’ provides a game-changing source of income.

Tech Support Outpost

Ok, and now we get to technical support, worthy of a bit more in-depth information. You see, eXp Realty is known throughout the industry as one of the most innovative technology brokerages. Our agents have access to some of the most powerful technologies in real estate. You’ll want to get to know our top technology tools that will help you successfully navigate eXp Realty and manage your business.

But, when you have a problem with our tech wonders, here’s where you go. Tech Support is open in eXp World from 8 am to 5 pm in all time zones. Go to tech support for your issues with Passport login, eXp Enterprise, Workplace, and more. Don’t know what those are? Here are some short explanations:

What is eXp Passport?

eXp Passport is our single sign-on system. With your eXp Passport account, you can conveniently access many of the applications you typically use through a single, secure sign-on experience.

What is eXp Enterprise?

eXp Enterprise is your personal launch pad for your business. Here you’ll have a dashboard to view your transactions and commissions. You’ll have access to numerous helpful applications like Skyslope, where you’ll easily handle deal paperwork, and eXp’s Marketing Center, where you can quickly customize loads of useful marketing materials. Outside of eXp World, you’re bound to spend most of your time in eXp Enterprise.

What is Workplace?

Workplace, made by Facebook, is an easy-to-use private collaboration platform for just eXp agents and staff. This is where we share best practices, keep up on company news and events, share referrals, and more. And, hey, it’s also another place to ask a question. Just type your question in on the search bar.

Education Opportunities

On to education opportunities in eXp World, there’s a lot! In fact, eXp World is a goldmine for continuous learning, offering over 50 hours of live training every week. These sessions are led by staff, brokers, and eXp’s top-performing ICON agents. The topics range widely, covering everything crucial to the industry.

Access the calendar in the Welcome Area, choose what interests you, and use the link to teleport to the correct room. Once inside, there’s always a method to zoom into the screen for easy viewing. Plus, all training is available on-demand, in case you can’t make a session that interests you.

Bottom line, whether you’re tuning in from across the globe or from the comfort of your home, eXp World brings top-notch training right to your screen.

Agent Solutions

Agent Solutions provides just what you’d expect – solutions to your agent needs. To get an overview “Go To” “Solutions”, then “eXp Solutions EXPO Hall”. Here you’ll see a complete suite of industry-leading vendors, tools, and services that agents can use throughout their real estate journey and can trust as an extension of their team. Let’s look at some of those:

What is kvCORE?

BoldTrail is a #1 ranked real estate agent platform that all eXp Realty agents get as part of their $85 monthly fee. It’s a powerful CRM, that offers, lead generation, a personal IDX website, lead-to-contract management, listing promotion, and more. Agents outside of eXp Realty pay up to $500 a month to get Boldtrail.

What is Utility Connect?

Utility Connect is a free white glove concierge service for your clients who are moving. This will simplify their move and save time and money using Utility Connect’s integrated platform to compare utility providers, get special offers, and connect your client’s essential home services all in one place.

What is eXp Realty Healthcare?

eXp Reality offers a healthcare option where agents save money and reduce risk. Clearwater Benefits offers several healthcare plan options to meet all agent’s unique needs. Agents save an average of $10,000 a year on fixed medical costs and 80% on out-of-pocket costs with Clearwater. Plus, agents have access to one of the largest PPO networks in the country. 

What is eXp’s Making It Rain?

eXp’s Making It Rain is a lead generation program for agents lacking time or expertise to leverage digital ad power. Making it Rain automates digital marketing programs for agents with products built to drive more ad results at a lower cost. Sophisticated advertising made simple!   

What is Curbio?

Curbio is eXp Realty’s solution for fast and reliable pre-listing home updates – like interior renovations, exterior improvements, and staging. No project is too big or too small. eXp agents get free, same-day estimates. Best for agents, you hand over the project to be fully managed by Curbio. Best for your client – they get competitive pricing, sell their home faster and for more, and pay nothing until their home sale closes.

What is eCommission?

eCommission is eXp Realty’s solution to solve agent cash flow gaps between deals by giving you access to your real estate commissions before closing. From top producers to agents just starting out, cash flow ups and downs are common to almost everyone selling real estate, and eCommission has got your back.

Other Solutions

Other eXp Realty agent solutions that you’ll find in eXp World include Success Lending for great lending rates, ExpressOffers & Opendoor for cash offers, Zenlist – to view eXp Exclusives (off-market properties), Property Management – for your clients that need it, and Blended Sense, a media technology platform making top-quality listing productions accessible and reliable for agents and many more.

eXp Commercial

Another place to visit in eXp World is eXp Commercial. While there’s a commercial booth in the Infosphere, eXp Commercial’s significance earns it a dedicated space too. Just hit “Go To” and select “Commercial” to teleport straight there.

Whether you’re looking to expand your knowledge or explore new opportunities in commercial real estate, this specialized area has everything you need to get started and thrive in the bustling commercial sector.

eXp World Entertainment Options

In eXp World, you can flex your creative muscles by crafting anything you envision within a Frame. You’ll set up your entertainment space using the same simple process we described for creating your office space.

These versatile environments offer a unique way to host client appreciation events. Picture guiding your clients through a virtual art gallery or enjoying a live concert together online. It’s a fresh and engaging approach to bring people together, connect with clients, and enhance your professional relationships.

Community Vibes in eXp World

Being a real estate agent can sometimes feel isolating. Enter eXp World – no need to get dressed or get in your car! Just hop online and chat with other agents who are just a click away. Just open your mic and start gabbing.

eXp World is buzzing with agents making connections. It’s a real social mixer without the awkward handshakes. Many eXp agents report that a quick conversation in eXp World led to a great partnership or a successful deal. This virtual world isn’t just about the chats; it’s a goldmine for networking and building real, profitable connections.

Mobile Accessibility

Are you wondering if you can access eXp World’s all-encompassing platform from your phone? No sweat! eXp World’s got you covered with its mobile-friendly setup.

Dive into the action from your smartphone or tablet and snag almost all the features you’d find on the desktop version. Sure, a few bells and whistles might be tweaked to fit your screen, but it’s all about keeping you in the loop seamlessly—whether you’re couch surfing or sealing deals in the streets.

Plus, eXp’s developers are on their toes, pushing updates that dial-up its usability and ensure you’re never left hanging. It’s all about making your mobile real estate hustle as smooth as possible, wherever you might be!

Future Innovations

eXp Realty is always on top of providing the best of the best. Plus, your thoughts and suggestions are super important. eXp World thrives on user feedback, transforming your bright ideas into real-world improvements. So don’t hesitate to speak up—your input might just spark the next big update!

And let’s not forget, eXp Realty isn’t just keeping pace—they’re setting the pace, leading the charge with innovations that leave agents in awe. With a commitment to always push boundaries, eXp World is on track to keep its spot as the premier virtual platform for real estate pros. From smoother navigation to more immersive environments, there’s always something new in the pipeline. Stay tuned, because eXp is all about giving you the cutting-edge tools you need to succeed.

The Future of Real Estate Is Virtual (And Functional)

If the thought of walking into another beige office with flickering fluorescent lights makes your soul sigh, then yeah—eXp World is probably your kind of place. This isn’t just a digital flex; it’s a full-blown upgrade to how real estate agents work, connect, and scale.

From broker access and support that doesn’t ghost you at 5 p.m., eXp World blends the “get it done” hustle with tools that actually help. Whether you’re closing deals in bunny slippers, troubleshooting tech in real time, or customizing your own virtual office that screams “I sell million-dollar listings,” this platform is built for modern agents who want real results without old-school friction.

And remember—this level of innovation doesn’t live in isolation. At eXp, collaboration is more than a buzzword—it’s the engine. And when you plug into a powerhouse sponsor team like Smart Agent Alliance, you’re not just logging in. You’re leveling up. Smart Agent Alliance runs meetings so you can gain passive income. How awesome is that? It’s like free money.  Smart Agent Alliance also gives agents access to:

  • A done-for-your-brand and hosted real estate attraction website

What are the business advantages of using eXp World?

eXp World slashes overhead costs, connects you to a global network of professionals, provides comprehensive training, facilitates broker interaction, and offers customizable virtual offices for client meetings—all in one platform.

The Evolution of eXp Realty Luxury

In October 2022, eXp Realty set the stage for a remarkable journey in luxury real estate by unveiling its prestigious eXp Luxury division. Fast forward to 2023, and the numbers speak volumes: a whopping $396 million closed on 856 transactions.

Since its launch in the United States, eXp Luxury has experienced exponential growth.  By November 2023, eXp welcomed over 1,100 members. Building on this triumph, eXp Luxury expanded its footprint to Canada in September 2023 and then ventured into Puerto Rico.

But the excitement doesn’t stop there! eXp Realty Luxury, with its plans to launch eXp Luxury to the United Kingdom, South Africa, Portugal, Australia, and New Zealand in early 2024, is set to revolutionize luxury real estate on a global scale.

Elite Marketing eXp Realty Luxury Clients Love!

As an eXp Realty Luxury agent, prepare to astound your luxury listings clients with the incredible value and unparalleled marketing prowess you bring to the table. Your clients will be captivated by the sophisticated strategies and innovative tools at your disposal, ensuring their luxury properties not only capture attention but also command the best prices in the market.

Luxury Listing Distribution

Prepare to dazzle your luxury clients with the unparalleled digital dominance of eXp Realty Luxury. Picture their delight as they see their home showcased in prestigious publications like The Wall Street Journal, Robb Report, Mansion Global, Barrons, Unique Homes, MarketWatch, UpMkt, Luxury Estate, and more!

Even better, as an eXp Realty luxury agent, you’ll walk into your listing appointment armed with an electronic mock-up featuring their home in these esteemed publications. Their beaming expression will confirm their excitement about having you guide the sale of their luxury property.

Moreover, this expansive marketing campaign ensures that your listing reaches a targeted demographic of potential buyers actively seeking high-end properties. With increased interest in the home and a faster sale at a higher price, both you and your client will be thrilled with the results.

Global Reach with eXp Realty Luxury [international reach picture]

But wait, there’s more! Your client will be amazed that their home will gain international exposure on over 80 purposeful international search sites.  That’s right!

eXp Realty will translate their home’s listing into many languages and share their home on sites that target affluent global buyers in China, Canada, Germany, Brazil, France, Australia, the United Kingdom, Singapore, the UAE, and more.

That means your client’s home will reach buyers and investors worldwide, maximizing the home’s potential reach like no other brokerage.

Plus, remind your clients that eXp Realty has nearly 90,000 agents across 25 countries. Your vast network of global agents offers another avenue to connect with buyers and investors globally, driving top-dollar results for our clients.

Perfect Luxury Listing Presentation

If prominent publications and global exposure weren’t enough, your clients will adore your sleek, ultra-competitive listing presentation! You’ll show them a dedicated property website featuring magazine-quality photos, high-definition videos, and breathtaking aerial animations.

It’s unparalleled in sophistication and style – they will remember you!

Local, Social & Mobile

Furthermore, at your listing presentation, you’ll explain how their home will benefit from cutting-edge social media technology and robust exposure on sites like Facebook and YouTube. You’ll demonstrate how our dedicated mobile and iPad tours allow for seamless viewing on every type of computer, smartphone, and tablet.

Testimonials 

Last, listen to what actual clients have said about their experience with eXp Luxury. 

John Siy, a Miami investor, says, “Access to a network of resources, a vast portfolio of high-end properties and the best in customer service is what sets eXp Luxury apart from the rest of the pack”. 

Kayle Moore, a Dallas customer, says, “There are plenty of opportunities in real estate, and I’ve found that most real estate agents want to do things the same old way.  eXp Luxury is different.  They’re technologically advanced, highly experienced, knowledgeable, and professional.  They helped set my property apart”.

As an eXp Luxury agent, you’ll showcase these eXp Realty Luxury testimonials, and many others, until you create your own excellent testimonials.

The eXp Realty Luxury Experience – What Agents Love!

eXp Realty Luxury is not just about setting the standard; it’s redefining excellence in the luxury real estate market. Agents are at the forefront, enjoying the benefits and delivering an unmatched client experience with unparalleled advertising reach in prestigious publications and globally.

But the allure of eXp Realty Luxury extends far beyond just that. Agents of eXp Luxury enjoy an innovative agent dashboard, elite training programs, and a vibrant community and spirit of collaboration.  Here’s a glimpse into what makes eXp Realty Luxury a standout choice for luxury real estate professionals.

Visiting eXp Luxury’s Client-Focused Website reveals a realm of sophistication and beauty. The site presents the unique advantages eXp Luxury offers to homebuyers and sellers, serving as a perfect primer to the luxurious and impressive world eXp Realty Luxury agents navigate.

That’s not all potential clients can do on the eXp Luxury site.  They can also request a detailed luxury marketing plan aimed at attracting qualified buyers to their home.  Further, they can get an up-to-the-minute expert valuation based on local conditions for their home. 

The bottom line for agents? Right then and there, eXp Luxury agents can connect with potential clients to provide the information they seek.  We know what that means – prime leads for luxury agents. 

A Dashboard Full of Value

Now let’s jump into the wealth of resources and opportunities available to eXp Realty luxury agents on their personal dashboard too.  Each luxury agent’s dashboard is engineered to enhance and streamline the real estate process. Here’s some of what’s inside luxury agent dashboards.

Initiate a Listing Campaign

Luxury agent dashboards simplify listing management. Agents can effortlessly organize, launch, and oversee listing campaigns, ensuring sellers’ properties are marketed effectively to find the ideal buyer promptly.

Branding in the Luxury Design Center

The ‘Luxury Design Center’ within the dashboard gives luxury agents exclusive access to elegant luxury branding materials.  Here, you can view the luxury branding logos that are reserved solely for eXp Realty Luxury agents. 

Luxury agents truly love this beautiful branding! The sleek, sophisticated branding of eXp Realty Luxury is similar, yet different, than eXp Realty’s standard branding choices. 

Further, the luxury branding includes several logo choices that agents can make to best match the vibe they desire.  All the branding choices nicely complement each other.  Thus, although luxury agents have choices, everything eXp Luxury maintains a unified look. 

One more thing about branding: all eXp agents can create their own branding when they maintain their own business names and call out “brokered by eXp Realty”.  That eXp Realty rule extends to luxury agents and all other eXp agents, allowing all agents to brand themselves as they see fit.    

Customizable Marketing Materials

Also located in the Luxury Design Center are eXp Luxury branded marketing materials.  Here, luxury agents can access professional-level templates and quickly personalize the materials with their own photos and details. 

This way, luxury agents quickly create compelling business assets without the cost and time that external creative services would require. From business cards, newsletters, email signatures, yard signs, property brochures, postcards, listing presentation pages, and more, luxury agents can easily create awesome-looking marketing materials.

Crafting Show-Stopping Listing Presentations

A powerful module, designed for the rapid creation of bespoke, branded listing presentations, resides within the agent dashboard. These listing presentation materials are sure to leave potential clients spellbound.

The process is astonishingly simple yet yields extraordinary professional results. Luxury agents simply insert a photo of a prospective client’s home into the tool.  Like magic, a 16-page personalized listing presentation materializes, ready to impress.

This listing presentation skillfully blends static and customizable marketing pages.  Luxury agents have everything needed to convert prospects into loyal clients and enthusiastic referral sources.

Access to Exclusive Vendors – A Curated List

Furthermore, the eXp Realty Luxury dashboard opens up a world of a carefully selected dynamic list of preferred vendors. This feature allows eXp Realty luxury agents to effortlessly find top-tier vendors, and it offers brief vendor overviews and direct links to vendor services.

Exclusive discounts are a hallmark of these partnerships.  That’s one of the powers of affiliating with a large agent-centric brokerage like eXp Realty!

The roster of current vendors covers a wide range of services critical to the luxury market.  It includes providers of high-end agent websites, sophisticated Customer Relationship Management (CRM) systems, premium quality photography and videography, distinctive client gifts, and innovative virtual staging solutions.

This curated list not only supports luxury agents in elevating their service but also in solidifying their status in the luxury real estate domain.

Beyond the Dashboard Basics

Before moving on to other eXp Realty Luxury benefits, let’s explore more useful information included in the luxury agent dashboard. Here, luxury agents can access a robust Support Center brimming with informative articles and videos. Additionally, here, agents can submit a support ticket for personalized assistance.

For those new to eXp Realty Luxury, there are also video tutorials to master what eXp Luxury offers. Moreover, the dashboard keeps agents informed with the latest news and updates, ensuring they stay ahead in the fast-paced luxury market.

Not to be overlooked is the agent directory, a vital tool for fostering connections within the eXp community. Whether it’s for referrals or seeking advice, this directory enhances collaboration among peers.

Additionally, the eXp Luxury Coaching Marketplace opens doors to further growth opportunities, allowing agents to seek guidance and mentorship from seasoned professionals.

Exclusive Private Masterminds to Elevate Your Luxury Real Estate Game

Unlock the door to more benefits with unparalleled growth and networking opportunities with eXp Realty Luxury’s exclusive private masterminds held online.

These are not your ordinary meetings.  They are a golden ticket to a council of seasoned eXp Luxury agents, offering a blend of training, coaching, and insider tips designed to catapult your luxury real estate career to new heights.

Held three times a month via Zoom, all masterminds are meticulously planned with a unique focus to enrich your professional journey.

The current schedule kicks off each month with a new luxury agent onboarding session on the first Wednesday, positioning new luxury agents to excel in the luxury market right from the start. The second and fourth Wednesdays are dedicated to educational content, with past topics like “Mastering the Luxury Open House” promising to enhance agent skills and strategy.

Additionally, the third Wednesday of each month shines a spotlight on eXp Realty Luxury preferred vendors, giving agents insider access to tools and services that can elevate listings and client satisfaction.

If you miss a video call, don’t worry. eXp Realty Luxury records all sessions and makes them available on your agent dashboard, giving you all the resources you need to succeed right at your fingertips.

These private masterminds do more than gather people. They pave your pathway to leadership in the luxury real estate market, placing you within a community of ambitious, like-minded professionals.

eXp Luxury Spotlight: Your Monthly Compass to Navigating Luxury Real Estate Excellence

Stay ahead in the fast-paced world of luxury real estate with the eXp Luxury Spotlight, the exclusive monthly email curated specifically for eXp Realty Luxury agents. This isn’t just another newsletter. It’s your premier source for all things eXp Luxury, designed to keep agents informed and one step ahead.

Each edition is packed with valuable insights, from the latest updates and enhancements within the eXp Luxury realm to upcoming events, training sessions, and invaluable resources.  The eXp Luxury Spotlight email keeps you informed, ensuring you always have up-to-date knowledge.

Joining Forces in a Community of Excellence: The Power of eXp Realty Luxury

When agents join eXp Luxury, they’re not just becoming a part of any community.  Agents step into a circle of like-minded professionals, all passionately pursuing excellence in the luxury real estate market.

This vibrant collective is where ambition meets opportunity, offering a fertile ground for growing business amidst the crème de la crème of the industry. At eXp Luxury, it’s about more than just making a sale.

Here’s where connection is about cultivating quality referrals, engaging in valuable networking, and seizing collaboration opportunities that are as unique as they are enriching. Let’s look at some of the methods eXp Realty Luxury agents use to connect.

eXp Realty Luxury’s Exclusive Online Community

Luxury agents have a unique digital sanctuary through a private online workplace group. This platform is a vibrant hub where luxury agents and leaders converge to chat, network, and share invaluable insights.

Within this secure environment, members can effortlessly exchange ideas, strategies, and success stories, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous learning. Additionally, the ability to search and pose questions adds another layer of value, enabling agents to tap into the collective wisdom of the community.

This digital community showcases eXp Luxury’s dedication to using technology to strengthen connections, share knowledge, and foster collaborative growth among its esteemed luxury real estate professionals.

Uniting in Success: eXp Realty Luxury Regional Rallies   

 If the digital connection is not good enough for you, eXp Realty Luxury has in-person regional rallies solely for eXp Luxury agents. These events, spirited and led by agents for agents, are designed to celebrate achievements across all stages of the real estate career journey.

As the real estate market evolves, these rallies serve as a pivotal moment for agents to engage, educate, celebrate, and inspire one another.

Whether an agent is looking to mark successes, glean insights from shifting markets, or simply revel in the camaraderie of fellow eXp Realty Luxury agents, the Regional Rallies promise an environment brimming with motivation and mutual support.

Exclusive eXp Realty Luxury Events: The Pinnacle of Networking

The eXp Realty Luxury experience includes exclusive events tailored just for luxury agents.  For example, there are special breakouts at EXPCON.

Imagine mingling with fellow luxury real estate professionals during a sophisticated cocktail hour, where the conversation flows as freely as the complimentary food and drinks.

These gatherings transcend typical events. They are cornerstone opportunities for agents to connect, share insights, and forge lasting relationships with peers who are at the top of their game in the luxury market.

It’s here, amidst the elegance and exclusivity, that agents find themselves not just attending another industry event.  Agents are also part of a memorable experience.

How to Become an eXp Realty Luxury Agent

You must first join eXp Realty to become eligible for the eXp Luxury program. Membership is attainable through either production achievements or approved credentials, ensuring that eXp Luxury agents represent the highest standards of success and expertise in the luxury market.

eXp Realty Luxury Agent Qualification by Production

Prospective eXp Realty Luxury members must have completed at least three (3) closed transactions within the last 24 months (if you represented both sides, that counts as two transactions), each at a price point of $1,000,000 or higher.

Alternatively, achieving three (3) closed transactions within a 24-month period at a value that is three times the average sales price according to your local MLS also meets the qualification criteria.

Note that you can qualify for eXp Realty Luxury membership with closed sales from any brokerage. If you’ve achieved 3 closed transactions in the past 24 months at any brokerage, that counts.

 You must submit supporting documentation for each property sale to validate your qualifying transactions. There are two options available to ensure a smooth verification process:

  • Option 1: Submit the MLS Listing sheet that verifies the sold status of the property and includes your agent details.

  • Option 2: Provide a HUD Settlement Statement with a Commission Disbursement Acknowledgement (CDA).

eXp Realty Luxury Agent Qualification by Credential 

Agents looking to qualify through credentials must hold one of the following:

  • eXp Luxury Certification, achievable through either the online eXp Luxury Certification Course or in-person event FastTrack Courses (available to eXp Realty agents at EXPCON), completed within the stipulated time limits.
  • Certified Luxury Home Marketing Specialist™ (CLHMS) designation from the Institute of Luxury Home Marketing.
  • Luxury Homes Certification from the National Association of Realtors® (NAR).

For more detailed information on how to embark on your journey as an eXp Realty Luxury agent and to explore further FAQs about the membership, visit eXp Luxury Membership Details.

eXp Realty Luxury Requirements for Team Members

Teams navigating their journey to eXp Realty Luxury gain unique advantages, including eligibility for discounted rates. However, to unlock these benefits, certain criteria must be met. 

Team members must belong to an officially registered eXp Realty Standard, Domestic, or Mega Icon Team. Crucially, the team leader must already be enrolled in eXp Luxury for team members to qualify for the discounted membership rate.

This framework ensures that the integrity and standards of the eXp Luxury program are upheld, providing a structured path for teams aiming to excel in the luxury market.

eXp Realty Luxury Requirement for Canadian Agents

eXp Realty warmly welcomes Canadian agents into the fold of eXp Luxury, acknowledging the vibrant and diverse real estate market in Canada.

It’s essential to recognize that the eXp Luxury division for Canadian agents comes with its own set of pricing, qualifications, and application processes, tailored to meet the unique demands of the Canadian luxury real estate landscape. Agents interested in elevating their career with eXp Luxury in Canada are encouraged to initiate their journey by visiting join eXp Luxury in Canada.

The Investment in Excellence: eXp Realty Luxury Membership Cost

Embarking on a journey with eXp Realty Luxury is an investment in elevating your real estate career to the highest echelons of the luxury market. For an annual fee of $2,500 USD for a primary member and $995 for team members, you unlock access to an unparalleled suite of marketing tools and resources.

This membership fee includes showcasing up to 10 luxury listings simultaneously across eXp Luxury’s elite digital publications and in more than 80 international markets.

It’s important to note that this limit refers to concurrent listings – you are not restricted to showcasing only 10 listings per year. Instead, as soon as one property is sold or removed, you can introduce another. This ongoing cycle of renewal allows you to showcase an ever-evolving collection of exquisite properties to a global audience all year round.

The value derived from joining eXp Luxury far surpasses the investment, translating into tens of thousands of dollars in marketing power, global exposure, and partner discounts.  Thus, with eXp Realty Luxury, the cost of membership is a stepping-stone to achieving unprecedented success in the luxury real estate market.

Elevate Your Luxury Game with the Right Brokerage (and the Right Team)

Luxury real estate has always been about standing out, and eXp Luxury just rewrote the playbook. From marketing perks that would make traditional brokerages sweat to a global reach most agents only dream about, this isn’t just a fancier version of the same old system. It’s a complete upgrade. The listing presentations? Showstoppers. The training? Useful. The community? Not just smoke and mirrors. And the agent dashboard? Your new power toolset with a black-tie dress code.

But here’s the real flex: you don’t have to navigate it alone.

At eXp Realty, collaboration isn’t a buzzword—it’s the business model. When you join as part of Smart Agent Alliance, you tap into an even deeper level of support built just for agents who want to grow fast and look good doing it.

Smart Agent Alliance runs meetings so you gain passive income. How awesome is that? It’s like free money.  Smart Agent Alliance also gives agents access to:

  • Social Agent Academy Pro ($10,500 value) for social media marketing
  • Weekly coaching sessions with top producers
  • Customizable lead funnels, email campaigns, and marketing templates
  • And more…

All are free for agents who join through the Smart Agent Alliance sponsor line. Learn more about how eXp Realty and Smart Agent Alliance can help you scale your career. Not sure how passive income grows?  You can play with the numbers using our exp realty revenue share calculator to see how much you could earn.

So if you’re serious about elevating your brand, boosting your listings, and stepping confidently into the luxury lane, you’re in the right place.

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I become an eXp Realty Luxury agent?

You must first join eXp Realty to become eligible for the eXp Luxury program. Membership is attainable through either production achievements or approved credentials, ensuring that eXp Luxury agents represent the highest standards of success and expertise in the luxury market.

excerpt: Key Points: Risk Mitigation: eXp handles legal liabilities, contracts, and agent oversight, reducing broker stress. Cost/Time Savings: Eliminate office expenses; leverage eXp’s tech, global admin…
content:
Key Points:

  • Risk Mitigation: eXp handles legal liabilities, contracts, and agent oversight, reducing broker stress.
  • Cost/Time Savings: Eliminate office expenses; leverage eXp’s tech, global admin support, and Regus workspaces.
  • Global Growth: Expand to 50 U.S. states and 24+ countries with no geographic limits.
  • Exponential Earnings: 7-tier revenue share model + incentives (Boost/Thrive) for recruitment and retention.
  • Passive Income Legacy: Retire with ongoing revenue share or will it to heirs.
